code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"../../styles/table.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Table(){const[rows,setRows]=useState(0);const[cols,setCols]=useState(0);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const newRow=parseInt(e.target.row.value);const newCol=parseInt(e.target.col.value);if(!isNaN(newRow)&&!isNaN(newCol)){setRows(newRow);setCols(newCol);}};const generateTable=()=>{const tableRows=[];let cellNumber=1;for(let i=0;i<rows;i++){const rowCells=[];for(let j=0;j<cols;j++){rowCells.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:cellNumber++},j));}tableRows.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:rowCells},i));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{className:"generated-table",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:tableRows})});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"Table Generation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Rows:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"row"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Columns:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"col"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Generate Table"})]}),rows>0&&cols>0&&generateTable()]});}export default Table;
